scenario.name: Author of test: Hamidreza Ramezami | RACF Test - UAC Scenario file
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[field3]@[remote_ip] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 From: <sip:[field0]@[remote_ip]>;tag=as7d0e3c1[call_number] To: <sip:[field3]@[remote_ip]> Contact: <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE User-Agent: SIPp/Linux Allow: INVITE, ACK, CANCEL, OPTIONS, BYE, REFER, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, INFO, PUBLISH Supported: replaces, timer Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=root 3588004004 3588004004 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=SIPp 3.4.1 c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 8 0 101 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000 a=rtpmap:101 telephone-event/8000 a=fmtp:101 0-16 a=ptime:20 a=sendrecv

ACK [$1] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=123456 [routes] Max-Forwards: 70 From: <sip:[field0]@[remote_ip]>;tag=as7d0e3c1[call_number] To: <sip:[field3]@[remote_ip]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] ACK Content-Length: 0

BYE [$1] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=123456 [routes] From: <sip:[field0]@[field1]>;tag=as7d0e3c1[call_number] [last_To:] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] BYE Max-Forwards: 10 Content-Length: 0
